title: Is it Possible to download the patches manually?
body: Just wanted to know if i could download the 2.6gb Patch Manually? through another computer then Transfer it to this one?

replies.body:
Yeah it's possible, but you still need one League client to download it from. 

I usually download the patch once through my main computer then copy the whole League of Legends folder to a external hard drive. Then simply transfer to another computer and replace the old League folder with the new one.

I would normally just connect the internet then just download it onto this beast of a machine, However having not much internet i just cant do it. 

The only way i could do that is if i could download the file directly to my external. So it updates to my hard drive directly.  Obviously using the libraries internet
You can copy the files over, yeah.
But where do i find all the files i need?
